theInvoker:InvokeRelic.NAME: Invoke
theInvoker:InvokeRelic.FLAVOR: Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell.
DESCRIPTIONS: When the Invoker has three invoker orbs channels creates an ethereal #ySpell at the start of each turn.

theInvoker:BottleRelic.NAME: Bottle
theInvoker:BottleRelic.FLAVOR: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
DESCRIPTIONS: Starts with 3 charges. Gain #b1 [E] and heal 5 HP each use.

theInvoker:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theInvoker:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theInvoker:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theInvoker:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
